landing1: Enjoy a touch of elegance and luxury with Platinum
landing2: Our online platform is the meeting point for gold and jewelry traders in the Kingdom. We take pride in providing a safe and seamless buying experience, with a wide and elegant selection that meets your needs.

name: name

giftt2: Choose this option if the transaction is for personal purchase.

sorry2: Current filtering may have resulted in you not finding the product you were looking for. You can use different filtering options to get better results.

forget2: Enter your phone number to receive the activation code to reset your password.
explore2: Discover the unique shopping experience by categories, where you can easily browse and choose products based on your interests and preferences.
similar1: Enjoy our distinctive collection of similar products that perfectly match your needs. These products resemble the original in terms of materials, weight, and manufacturing quality.
final order: Thank you! Your order has been successfully received.
get offer: Get free shipping for orders over
empty cart1: Your shopping cart is currently empty. Browse our exquisite products and complete your personal experience by adding a unique piece to your collection.
shop2: You can now complete the purchase process easily without registration, or you can log in for more benefits and track your orders.
explore3: Explore a stunning range of leading international brands in the world of jewelry and design on the Platinum website.
market desc: We are here to provide you with the latest prices instantly, ensuring that you are always informed about fluctuations in the gold market and buying and selling opportunities at the right time.
gift desc1: We offer you an exceptional feature that allows you to send a special gift to your loved ones. Enjoy a unique experience with Platinum by delivering your feelings in a special and distinctive way.
gift2: Choose a Gift that Suits Your Taste
gift desc2: Browse a variety of available gifts and select the perfect gift for the person you want to send it to. Once you choose the gift, proceed to enter the recipient's information.
gift desc3: Enter the recipient's information, including their name, address, and phone number. Then, write a personal message to accompany the gift.
gift desc4: At this stage, you have control over sending a text message to the recipient to inform them of the imminent arrival of the gift. You can choose whether or not to send the text message.
gift desc5: Ensure the safe and secure delivery of the gift to the recipient. We always aim to provide a unique and distinctive experience, paying special attention to every detail of the gift and delivery process to make it unforgettable.
info desc1: Fast and reliable delivery for your products with well-known shipping companies. We aim to ensure that you receive your orders as soon as possible.
info desc2: Your satisfaction is essential to us. If you are not satisfied with the product, you can request a refund within a specified period.
info desc3: We are here to help. A dedicated customer support team is ready to answer your queries and solve your problems at any time.
info desc4: We care about the security of your transactions. We offer multiple payment options and accept all types of cards to facilitate secure purchases.
subNowText: Subscribe to our mailing list now to receive the latest news and updates from Platin!
update: Gold prices are updated every 24 hours
wish1: Browse your wishes now, and you can also share your wishes with your loved ones either through a product-specific link or through social media platforms.
empty fav1: Your favorites list is currently empty. Browse our exquisite products and complete your personal experience by adding a unique piece to your collection.
share comment: Share your comment on the product with us!
